alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 6:20PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Mobile and west central Baldwin Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 620 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over I65 And AL 158, or over Saraland, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Prichard, Daphne, Fairhope, Saraland, Bay Minette, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Spanish Fort, Creola, Loxley, Stapleton, Axis, Semmes, I65 And I165, I65 And AL 158 and I10 And I65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland
